meanings.definition: The period of life just before puberty.
meanings.sent1: During prepuberties, children may experience growth spurts.
meanings.sent2: She was excited to enter prepuberties and become a teenager.
meanings.sent3: The prepuberties of the puppy made it clumsy and adorable.
meanings.sent4: The prepuberties of the city were evident in its rapid development.
meanings.sent5: The prepuberties of the caterpillar transforming into a butterfly was fascinating to watch.

meanings.definition: The state of being in the prepubertal stage.
meanings.sent1: Her prepuberties made her feel like she was in between being a child and a teenager.
meanings.sent2: The prepuberties of the young boy were evident in his innocence and curiosity.
meanings.sent3: The prepuberties of the plant waiting to bloom was like a suspenseful story.
meanings.sent4: The prepuberties of the storm hinted at the powerful thunder that would come.
meanings.sent5: The prepuberties of the volcano indicated an imminent eruption.
